scripts.build:legacy: npm run prepare && tsx Build.ts e2b-legacy
scripts.docker:build: npm run prepare && docker build -f e2b.Dockerfile -t jolli-e2b --platform linux/amd64 .
scripts.prepare:dist: cd ../tools/jolliagent && npm run build && cd ../../sandbox && rm -rf dist && cp -r ../tools/jolliagent/dist dist
scripts.prepare:tools: echo 'Vendoring tools...' && for t in code2docusaurus docusaurus2vercel docs2docusaurus code2openapi; do cd ../tools/$t && npm run build && npm run package && cd ../../sandbox && mkdir -p dist/tools/$t && cp -r ../tools/$t/dist dist/tools/$t/ && cp ../tools/$t/package.json dist/tools/$t/; done
scripts.prepare:cli: cd ../cli && bun run build:linux && cd ../sandbox && mkdir -p dist/bin && cp ../cli/dist/bin/jolli-linux-x64 dist/bin/jolli
scripts.prepare: npm run prepare:dist && npm run prepare:tools && npm run prepare:cli
